mapper.insert: insert into golforboard_reply (r_no, b_no, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{b_no},#{reply},#{replyer})
mapper.select: select * from golforboard_reply where b_no=#{b_no} order by r_no desc
mapper.update: update golforboard_reply set reply=#{reply}, updatedate=sysdate where r_no =#{r_no}
